original_text: Then the nations around you that remain will know that I the Lord have rebuilt what was destroyed and have replanted what was desolate. I the Lord have spoken, and I will do it.’
korean_text: 너희 사방에 남은 이방 사람이 나 여호와가 무너진 곳을 건축하며 황폐한 자리에 심은 줄을 알리라 나 여호와가 말하였으니 이루리라

sentences.original_text: Then the nations around you that remain
that I the Lord have rebuilt what was destroyed
sentences.korean_translation: 나 여호와가 무너진 것을 다시 건축하고

sentences.original_text: and have replanted what was desolate
